alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 30 at 11:12AM ChST until May 30 at 2:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tiyan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Tamuning in the Marianas... Andersen AFB in the Marianas... Dededo in the Marianas... Mangilao in the Marianas... Yigo in the Marianas... * Until 200 PM ChST. * At 1112 AM ChST, gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Tamuning, Andersen AFB, Dededo, Mangilao and Yigo FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
